title: Asao-san to Kurata-kun
sinopse:
The number of friends which Asao Ran has is 0. While she is trying to change herself, things do not go so smoothly. Within these days, a certain meeting slowly bring about changes.... From the author of the popular webcomic 'Hori-san to Miyamura-kun', HERO, comes a brand new heart-pounding youth love comedy!

(Source: MU)
